SEARCH
Package me.mapokapo.features.teams

Class TeamRepository

java.lang.Object
me.mapokapo.features.teams.TeamRepository
public class TeamRepository extends Object
This class serves as a data repository for Team objects. The data source of this repository is a temporary in-memory solution for now, consisting of a simple ArrayList.

  • Method Details

    • getNextIndex

      public int getNextIndex()
      Gets the next available index for a new team. This is simply the size of the current list of teams.
      Returns:
      The next available index to use for creating a new team.

    • getTeamById

      public Optional<Team> getTeamById(int teamId)
      Gets a team by its ID.
      Parameters:
      teamId - The ID of the team to get.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the team if found, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • getAllTeams

      public List<Team> getAllTeams()
      Gets all teams in the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all teams.

    • addTeam

      public Team addTeam(Team team)
      Adds a team to the repository.
      Parameters:
      team - The team to add.
      Returns:
      The added team.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the team already exists in the repository.

    • removeTeam

      public void removeTeam(int teamId)
      Removes a team from the repository.
      Parameters:
      teamId - The ID of the team to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the team does not exist in the repository.
